Interface IUnbindable

Namespace
osu.Framework.Bindables
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Interface for objects that support publicly unbinding events or IBindables.

public interface IUnbindable

Methods

UnbindAll()

Calls UnbindEvents() and UnbindBindings()

void UnbindAll()

UnbindBindings()

Unbinds all bound IBindables.

void UnbindBindings()

UnbindEvents()

Unbinds all bound events.

void UnbindEvents()

UnbindFrom(IUnbindable)

Unbinds ourselves from another IBindable such that we stop receiving updates it. The other IBindable will also stop receiving any events from us.

void UnbindFrom(IUnbindable them)

Parameters

them IUnbindable

The other bindable.
